Posts.Content: For those that had the IBC but was negative in ultrasound and mammogram, what testing did you have? I have a small area of redness and I've had pain forever but today's results were negative. (Ultrasound and mammogram)
Posts.Title: Did anyone's cancer NOT show up on Mammogram or Ultrasound?
